page.title: 20GAMES
page.content: Playground games are very popular. They include chasing games,skipping played with ropes, games played with footballs, tennis balls, rugby balls, beach balls and power balls. { DODGE BALL}is where two people try to hit the others by throwing a football. If the person is hit below the knee, he is out. .the last player out is the winner. {SKIPPING}is done to rhymes with 2 people holding the rope at each end and twirling it. One of the rhymes is{ {"GRANNY IN THE KITCHEN"}where one person jumps in and the others sing, "Granny in the kitchen, doing some stitching.." When they sing,"In comes the Bogey Man and frightens Granny out" the person who is next in line jumps in and the other person jumps out.
